title: The Voice of the Ancient Bard, by William Blake
subject: librivox; audiobook; literature; poetry
description: Librivox recording of The Voice of the Ancient Bard, by William Blake. Librivox volunteers bring you six different readings of The Voice of the Ancient Bard, by William Blake. This is a weekly poetry project. (Summary by Annie Coleman) For more information about our readers, see our catalog page: http://librivox.org/voice-of-the-ancient-bard-by-william-blake/ For more free audiobooks or to become a volunteer reader, please visit librivox.org M4B format available
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
creator: William Blake
